publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3742 Congratulations to Maryhill Housing Association and the Lintel Trust (lodged on 18 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*

S3M-3742 Patricia Ferguson: Congratulations to Maryhill Housing Association and the Lintel Trust—That the Parliament congratulates Maryhill Housing Association’s team, Vamos Maryhill, on its victory in the annual charity tennis event for the Lintel Trust; commends both Maryhill Housing Association and the Lintel Trust for the excellent work that they do in helping people in housing need; acknowledges the contribution of the other teams that took part in the successful event, raising £1,500 for the Lintel Trust, and recognises that this victory for Maryhill Housing Association proves that its team excels across the range of its endeavours. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Sandra White
